snippet.title: Modern City Center by Amipolizeifunk | Content Creator Pack | Cities: Skylines
snippet.description:
$4.99€ on PC, Xbox One, and PS4 (PS4 releases tomorrow, Nov 8th)
Jason, known as Amipolizeifunk on Steam Workshop, has put together a massive pack of new buildings that will help you define your city center with modern looking wall-to-wall buildings. These buildings are the perfect fit for a modern city center!

Purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1148020/ 
Also available on Xbox One and Playstation 4! Go to your console store pages to purchase
**PS4 Release on Friday, November 8th**

The pack comes with 39 unique models that each have multiple variants, resulting in 70 new assets for your cities!

This is the first pack to include semi-transparent glass barriers and awnings, allowing both modders and veteran builders alike to create amazing new cities.

By purchasing this pack you directly support the creator, and future creators from within our community!

Also available is the new Downtown Radio Station, which can be purchased in a bundle with the Modern City Center Pack for a discount price! Details are on each store page.

Purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1148021/Cities_Skylines__Downtown_Radio/
Also available on Xbox One and PS4 (Releasing November 8th on PS4)
----------------------------------------------------------------------

Be sure to subscribe for more Cities: Skylines content! https://pdxint.at/Subscribe

https://www.instagram.com/cities_skylines_official
